Description:
The AdverseEvent resource returns data about an event that caused unintended physical injury resulting from or contributed to by medical care, a research study, or other healthcare setting factors. These events might require additional monitoring, treatment, or hospitalization, or might result in the death of a patient.

A user or staff member accessing this FHIR resource must have security to vew adverse events for research studies.

This resource requires additional setup if the organization has custom category list values for adverse event grades or research study attribution.

AdverseEvent.Name: AdverseEvent
AdverseEvent.Description: A single instance of a FHIR AdverseEvent resource.

actuality.Name: actuality
actuality.Description: The nature of the adverse event, either real or potential.

adverse-event-expected.Name: extension
adverse-event-expected.Description: Whether this adverse event is expected.

adverse-event-resolved-date.Name: extension
adverse-event-resolved-date.Description: The date the adverse event was documented as ended.

adverse-event-severity-history.Name: extension
adverse-event-severity-history.Description: A record of the historic severities for a particular adverse event.

adverse-event-severity-history-line.Name: extension
adverse-event-severity-history-line.Description: A specific instance in the severity history for a particular adverse event.

adverse-event-severity.Name: extension
adverse-event-severity.Description: The grade of an adverse event at a point in time.

adverse-event-severity-start-date.Name: extension
adverse-event-severity-start-date.Description: The date the adverse event was documented as started.

category.Name: category
category.Description: Displays the status for a patient's goal.

event.Name: event
event.Description: Type of the event itself in relation to the subject.

outcome.Name: outcome
outcome.Description: The outcome of the adverse event. Currently providing only "resolved" and "ongoing."

recordedDate.Name: recordedDate
recordedDate.Description: When the event was recorded from the audit trail. This is when the event was first recorded.

recorder.Name: recorder
recorder.Description: The recorder of the adverse event. This is the user who first recorded the adverse event.

seriousness.Name: seriousness
seriousness.Description: The seriousness of the event. This is populated with "Serious" or "Non-Serious."

severity.Name: severity
severity.Description: The severity of the adverse event itself, in direct relation to the subject.

study.Name: study
study.Description: The research study related to this adverse event.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: Subject impacted by the event, such as the patient.

suspectEntity.Name: suspectEntity
suspectEntity.Description: The suspected agent causing the adverse event.
